original_title: The Most Canceled Man in America
overview: A young political activist is openly targeted by the US Government for his involvement in nationwide protests and the events of January 6th, 2021. With his money seized and no ability to board a plane, he leads a movement to new heights.
tagline: Put on the no-fly list.  Removed from every platform.  Who is the most canceled man in America?
title: The Most Canceled Man in America
